snippet: Moments after being elected speaker of the House, Mark Ferrandino vowed to reintroduce a bill to allow civil unions for gay couples that Republicans had blocked in the spring.
abstract: Democratic lawmakers in Colorado elect State Rep Mark Ferrandino as state's first openly gay speaker of the House; vows to reintroduce bill to allow civil unions for gay couples that Republicans had blocked in the spring.
lead_paragraph: Moments after being elected speaker of the House, Mark Ferrandino vowed to reintroduce a bill to allow civil unions for gay couples that Republicans had blocked in the spring.

headline.seo: Mark Ferrandino Is Elected Colorado’s First Gay Speaker
headline.main: Colorado Democrats Elect State’s First Gay Speaker
headline.print_headline: Colorado Democrats Elect State’s First Gay Speaker

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
